      Category Thread.getCategory() 
      private Category ThreadLoader.getCategory(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc)
      Gets the thread category for the given thread.
      static Category Category.parseCategory(java.lang.String s)
      Gets the Category instance of the given category location.
      For example:
      "/forums/discussions/creations/" = Category.CREATIONS
      "/forums/pmc/introductions/" = Category.INTRODUCTIONS
      static Category Category.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Category[] Category.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      Gets the given number of threads from the given category in order of newest to oldest.

      Gets the given number of threads from the given category in the order specified by the the Thread.Feed.

      Gets all the threads under the given category in the specified page range in order as defined by given feed.
